name: BadgerGoGo
description:
A short text based adventure in which you are a badger.

Made for the University of Calgary Game Design Club's 2021 text based game jam.

It's super sketch to just expect you to trust that this .exe is not a varus, here is source if you are concerned (or want to compile it yourself or whatever):

https://github.com/ben-baqa/Badger-Go-Go

[HELP]

commands:

-look

-eat

-go
